description: Gov. Jerry Brown ordered mandatory water restrictions for the first time in California history. How will water rationing affect you?
title: How Has the California Drought Affected You?
title_page: How Has the California Drought Affected You? - The New York Times
maintext:
Gov. Jerry Brown ordered mandatory water restrictions for the first time in California history this week, saying the state’s drought had reached near-crisis proportions.
State officials said they would impose cutbacks on water use for a wide range of California residents and businesses — including homeowners, farmers, cemeteries and golf courses.
How will Californians respond to these restrictions?
New York Times reporters writing about the drought in California would like to hear from California residents about their experiences. Your name and comments may be published, but your contact information will not. A reporter or editor may follow up with you to learn more about your story.
